update_log.change: Modified the Export Structure of Request Parameter and Response Parameter

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is ecosystem

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for preventing data tampering

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to use API. Will be verified every time it is used.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Uniquely tracks identifier for a shop

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for trace

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: The error or fail error notice if the request fails and will be empty if the request succeeds

error_codes.description: There is no system_failure or policy
There is no partner_id or empty
Currently a primary category cannot be deleted

notes: The documentation includes common parameters, request parameters, response parameters, request examples, response examples, and error codes. All parameters and their descriptions have been captured.
